name: Coin Puzzles
description:
You can turn off the music in the optionsmenu.

This is the post jam build (jam build down below), with small improvements to the experience and a second extra level.

Gameplay

Coin Puzzles is a puzzle platformer made for Ludum Dare 44. The theme for this Ludum Dare was "Your life is currency". In the game you control a bag of coins. The amount of coins in the bag influences your movement and interaction with other objects.

Controls

Move and jump using wasd or the arrow keys, if you want you can also jump using the spacebar.

Settings

The in game options are a bit limited, but there is a sound slider and a toggle to turn on/off the music. There is also a slider for Awesomeness which might completely change the game into FPS, but it could also do absolutely nothing at all.

Total development time: 22 hours + 4 hours [post-jam]
